method.name: i_cal_vcard_property_new

parameter.name: kind
parameter.comment: The kind of #ICalVcardProperty to be created

returns.comment: The newly created #ICalVcardProperty with the type @kind.

method.comment: Creates an #ICalVcardProperty of the @kind.

method.name: i_cal_vcard_property_clone

returns.comment: The newly created #ICalVcardProperty deeply cloned from @prop.

method.comment: Deeply clones the @prop.

method.name: i_cal_vcard_property_new_from_string

parameter.name: str
parameter.comment: The string used to construct an #ICalVcardProperty

method.comment: Creates an #ICalVcardProperty from a string.

method.name: i_cal_vcard_property_as_vcard_string
method.comment: Converts an #ICalVcardProperty to a string representation.

method.name: i_cal_vcard_property_free
method.comment: Frees the @prop.

method.name: i_cal_vcard_property_isa

parameter.name: property
parameter.comment: The #ICalVcardProperty which type is to be determined

method.comment: Gets the kind of the @property.

method.name: i_cal_vcard_property_isa_property

parameter.name: property
parameter.comment: The object whose native part to be checked

returns.comment: true if the native part of @property is of the type icalproperty, false if not.

method.comment: Checks whether the native part of #ICalVcardProperty is valid vCard property.

method.name: i_cal_vcard_property_add_parameter

parameter.name: parameter
parameter.comment: The parameter to be added into @prop

method.comment: Adds an #ICalVcardParameter into the #ICalVcardProperty. It behaves like set the copy of the #ICalVcardParameter. Upon completion the native part of #ICalVcardParameter will be set to %NULL.

method.name: i_cal_vcard_property_take_parameter

parameter.name: parameter
parameter.comment: The parameter to be added into @prop

method.comment: Adds the @parameter into the @prop and frees the @parameter.

method.name: i_cal_vcard_property_set_parameter

parameter.name: parameter
parameter.comment: The parameter to be set into @prop

method.comment: Sets an #ICalVcardParameter into the #ICalVcardProperty. It behaves like set the copy of the #ICalVcardParameter. Upon completion the native part of #ICalVcardParameter will be set to NULL.

method.name: i_cal_vcard_property_set_parameter_from_string
method.comment: Sets the #ICalVcardProperty with the parameter defined by the name and value.

method.name: i_cal_vcard_property_get_parameter_as_string

parameter.name: name
parameter.comment: The name of the target parameter

returns.comment: The string representation of the parameter.

method.comment: Gets the string representation of the target parameter in the #ICalVcardProperty.

method.name: i_cal_vcard_property_remove_parameter_by_kind
method.comment: Removes all parameters of kind @kind from the @prop.

method.name: i_cal_vcard_property_remove_parameter_by_name

parameter.name: name
parameter.comment: The name of the parameter to be removed

method.comment: Removes all parameters of name @name from the @prop.

method.name: i_cal_vcard_property_remove_parameter_by_ref
method.comment: Removes the parameter in the #ICalVcardProperty by ref.

method.name: i_cal_vcard_property_count_parameters

returns.comment: The count of the parameters in the #ICalVcardProperty.

method.comment: Counts the parameters in the #ICalVcardProperty.

method.name: i_cal_vcard_property_get_first_parameter

parameter.name: kind
parameter.comment: The target kind of #ICalVcardParameter to be retrieved

method.comment: Gets the first #ICalVcardParameter from the parent #ICalVcardProperty.

method.name: i_cal_vcard_property_get_next_parameter

parameter.name: kind
parameter.comment: The target kind of #ICalVcardParameter to be retrieved

method.comment: Gets the next #ICalVcardParameter from the parent #ICalVcardProperty.

method.name: i_cal_vcard_property_set_value

parameter.name: value
parameter.comment: The #ICalVcardValue will be set as the property of @prop

method.comment: Sets the #ICalVcardProperty with the #ICalVcardValue.

method.name: i_cal_vcard_property_take_value

parameter.name: value
parameter.comment: The #ICalVcardValue will be set as the property of @prop

method.comment: Sets the @prop with the @value and unrefs the @value.

method.name: i_cal_vcard_property_set_value_from_string

parameter.name: value
parameter.comment: The value used to construct the #ICalVcardValue

parameter.name: kind
parameter.comment: The kind used to construct the #ICalVcardValue

method.comment: Sets the #ICalVcardProperty with the #ICalVcardValue constructed from string.

method.name: i_cal_vcard_property_get_value
method.comment: Gets the #ICalVcardValue of #ICalVcardProperty.

method.name: i_cal_vcard_property_get_value_as_string

returns.comment: The string representation of the value of the #ICalVcardProperty.

method.comment: Gets the string representation of the value in #ICalVcardProperty.

method.name: i_cal_vcard_value_set_parent
method.comment: Sets the parent property of a value.

method.name: i_cal_vcard_value_get_parent
method.comment: Gets the parent #ICalVcardProperty of the specified #ICalVcardValue.

method.name: i_cal_vcard_property_set_x_name
method.comment: Sets the name of X property for the #ICalVcardProperty.

method.name: i_cal_vcard_property_get_x_name
method.comment: Gets the name of X property.

method.name: i_cal_vcard_property_set_group
method.comment: Sets the group name of the @prop.

method.name: i_cal_vcard_property_get_group
method.comment: Gets the group name of the @prop.

method.name: i_cal_vcard_property_get_property_name
method.comment: Gets the property name of #ICalVcardProperty.

method.name: i_cal_vcard_parameter_value_to_value_kind
method.comment: Converts the #ICalVcardParameterValue to #ICalVcardValueKind.

method.name: i_cal_vcard_parameter_set_parent
method.comment: Sets the parent #ICalVcardProperty of an #ICalVcardParameter.

method.name: i_cal_vcard_parameter_get_parent
method.comment: Gets the parent #ICalVcardProperty of the specified #ICalVcardParameter.

method.name: i_cal_vcard_property_kind_to_value_kind
method.comment: Converts the #ICalVcardPropertyKind to #ICalVcardValueKind.

method.name: i_cal_vcard_value_kind_to_property_kind
method.comment: Converts an #ICalVcardValueKind to an #ICalVcardPropertyKind.

method.name: i_cal_vcard_property_kind_to_string
method.comment: Converts the #ICalVcardPropertyKind to a string.

method.name: i_cal_vcard_property_kind_from_string
method.comment: Converts the string to #ICalVcardPropertyKind.

method.name: i_cal_vcard_property_kind_is_valid

returns.comment: true if valid, false if not.

method.comment: Checks whether #ICalVcardPropertyKind is valid.

method.name: i_cal_vcard_property_enum_to_string

returns.comment: String representation of the @e, or %NULL, when the @e is an unknown enum.

method.comment: Gets string representation of the @e.

method.name: i_cal_vcard_property_kind_and_string_to_enum

returns.comment: enum value for the provided @kind and @str, or 0 for unknown kind.

method.comment: Returns enum value for the provided @kind and @str, or 0 for unknown kind.

method.name: i_cal_vcard_property_enum_belongs_to_property

returns.comment: true if the @kind can hold @e, false if not.

method.comment: Checks whether the @kind can hold @e.

method.name: i_cal_vcard_property_normalize
method.comment: Normalizes (reorder and sorts) the parameters of the @prop.

method.name: i_cal_vcard_property_kind_is_structured

returns.comment: whether the @kind is a structured property

method.comment: Returns whether the @kind is a structured property. Structured properties have their value encoded in a specific format.

method.name: i_cal_vcard_property_kind_is_multivalued

returns.comment: whether the @kind is a multivalued property

method.comment: Returns whether the @kind is a multivalued property. Multivalued properties can hold more than one value.

method.name: i_cal_vcard_property_add_type_parameter
method.comment: Adds an #ICalVcardParameterType TYPE parameter into the @prop. See also i_cal_vcard_property_add_type_x_parameter()

method.name: i_cal_vcard_property_add_type_x_parameter

parameter.name: type_param
parameter.comment: an X value of a TYPE parameter

method.comment: Adds an X (custom) TYPE parameter into the @prop. See also i_cal_vcard_property_add_type_parameter()
